{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BT |model=Smart Hub |revision=Type A (Home Hub 6) |serialnum_prefix=084316, 084319 |asin=B01IZYZN0E;GB; |est_release_date=07/28/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |availability=now |type=CPE, wireless router, dsl modem |flags=ADSL2+,VDSL2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63137 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF2G18AC-XKI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646G-HCH9 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN/BT RF Front End;Skyworks;SKY85310-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF Front End;Skyworks;SKY85712-11;;4; ,,, VDSL Analog Front End (LD/AFE);Broadcom;BCM6303;;1; |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |default_ssid=BTHub6-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^BTHub6-[A-Z0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' }} {{TagLine|BT Smart Hub Type A (Home Hub 6)}} :{{SupportPage|http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/46549/c/}} * [http://www.shop.bt.com/products/bt-smart-hub-088138-C6NX.html On the '''BT Shop'''] * [http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/35298/~/bt-home-hub%2C-bt-voyager-and-connected-devices-gpl-code GPL Code for the ''Home Hub''] ===Specifications=== {{WPLink|BT Home Hub}} • [[BT Home Hub]] *'''BT Home Hub 5 (Type A)''' • CPU: PXB4395 PSB 80910 (XWAY VRX268) *'''BT Home Hub 5 (Type B)''' • CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63268 @400MHz *'''BT Smart Hub Type A (Home Hub 6 A)''' • CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63137 @1GHz *'''BT Smart Hub Type B (home Hub 6 B)''' • CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB4395 @800MHz *[http://www.techinsights.com/reports-and-subscriptions/open-market-reports/Report-Profile/?ReportKey=11572 ''Teardown of the BT Smart Hub (084316)'' on '''TechInsights'''] :CPU: 1GHz Dual-Core ADSL2+/VDSL2 IAD SoC (ARM Cortex-A9) :Flash: 256MB (SLC NAND Flash), RAM: 256MB (DDR3 SDRAM) *[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9kOXMmNhTJk ''Inside the BT Smart Hub (BT Home Hub 6) router and how to open it''] {{SCollapse|''Gavin Hodgson'' comment | :I've just torn one down myself. You can take the heat sink off of you undo :the three screws that secure it on the solder side; :the shielding cans are friction fit not soldered, so you can actually expose :all the ICs in a non-destructive teardown. The key components are: :Main SoC Broadcom BCM63137 :WLAN SoC 2.4GHz Broadcom BCM43602 :WLAN SoC 5GHz Broadcom BCM4366 :WLAN RF Front End 2.4GHz Skyworks SKY85310-11 (also Bluetooth capable) :WLAN RF Front End 5GHz Skyworks SKY85712-11 :LAN Switch Broadcom BCM63137 :DSL Front End Broadcom BCM6303 :DRAM 256 MB (Samsung) :Flash 256 MB (Macronix) :Looks like the PCB is six layer, standard FR-4 :Despite what's floating around on the internet, looks to me like the USB is a 2.0 not a 3.0. :Seven unused coaxial connections; one on each of the antenna tracks. :The coaxial cable on the solder side transports one of the 2.4 GHz signals }} ===Reviews=== *[http://www.ispreview.co.uk/index.php/2016/06/uk-isp-bt-launches-new-smart-hub-wireless-broadband-router.html ''BT Launches Smart Hub Wireless Broadband Router'' on '''ISPreview'''] :[http://www.ispreview.co.uk/index.php/2016/08/uk-isp-bt-publish-speedtests-smart-hub-wifi-router-vs-rivals.html ''BT Publish Speedtests of their Smart Hub WiFi Router vs Rivals''] *[http://www.expertreviews.co.uk/bt/bt-smart-hub ''BT Smart Hub Wireless Broadband Router'' on '''ExpertReviews'''] *[http://www.trustedreviews.com/bt-smart-hub-review ''BT Smart Hub Wireless Router'' on '''TrustedReviews'''] ===Power consumption=== 
Model		   Home Hub 5A	Home Hub 5B   Home Hub 6
In operation		9.2W	    14.0W	  11.0W
Idle			6.3W	     7.2W	   7.0W
Standby mode		0.2W	     0.1W	   0.1W
===See also=== *[[BT Business Hub 5]] - Mfr#: 076399 [https://www.amazon.co.uk/BT-076399-Business-Hub-5/dp/B00VP3K9U2/ Amazon] *[[BT Mini Hub Kit]] - Mfr#: 086022 *[[BT Smart Hub]] - Mfr#: 088138 :2.4GHz: 802.11b/g/n 3x3 MIMO :5GHz: 802.11an/ac 4x4 MIMO :ADSL2+ and VDSL2 __NOTOC__
